title: Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/691 of 30 January 2020 supplementing Regulation (EU) 2016/429 of the European Parliament and of Council as regards rules for aquaculture establishments and transporters of aquatic animals (Text with EEA relevance) (Text with EEA relevance)
author_labels: Directorate-General for Health and Food Safety

                                                (i)

                                             	
                                                after risk assessment, in the aquaculture establishment or aquaculture establishments within the group which pose the highest risk of disease introduction; or

                                             


                                    	
                                                (ii)

                                             	
                                                to the establishment which has had the greatest number of movements of aquaculture animals for further farming, since the last risk-based surveillance visit was carried out.

                                             


                                    In either case, the steps outlined in point1 (c) to (g) must be followed during the risk-based surveillance visit.
